title: Andersonville National Historic Site: Materials to Loan
body: Materials to Loan          Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Andersonville National Historic Site Park Films    On request, teachers may borrow a copy of the park's two orientation films, "Echoes of Captivity" and "Voices from Andersonville" on DVD. Each program is about 30 minutes in length.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:Fourth Grade-General Subjects:Civil War, Cold War, History, Mexican War, Military and Wartime History, Revolutionary War, Social Studies, War of 1812, World War I, World War II National/State Standards:Georgia Performance Standards SSUSH 9, SS8H6, SS5H1
